titleStmt.title: An Askew, intituled, I am a woman poor and blind.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for A.M. and sold by the booksellers of London,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "I am a woman poor and blind ..."
Mounted with: A rare example of a vertuous maid in Paris. A single sheet divided for mounting?
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
